Description: Book of the Dead of Amenemhat. Assembled from six pieces; painted vignette corroded.
Findspot: Found/Acquired: Egypt, The Memphite region has been suggested based on orthographic resemblance with other papyri; see Munro 2022
Curator's comments: Rightmost fragment belongs to left of leftmost. Misplaced fragment at centre right = BD 99; inverted fragment at centre left = BD 149, 3rd mound. Two fragments belonging to the same papyrus appeared on the art market in 2021, and are now in a private collection; see Munro 2022.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (134288) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/134288)
Munro 2022 / Die Zugehörigkeit zweier neuer Totenbuch-Fragmente zu pBM EA9914
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: fractured, cockled, loss, delaminating Black ink Backed: white paper Supported overall: brown paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Sandwich: board Binding: cloth Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: D Curatorial condition comment: fair (incomplete - fragmentary)
